title: Kuradashi: E-Commerce Website that Combines Food Loss with Social Good | TOKYO UPDATES [The Official ... - TOKYO UPDATES（トーキョー・アップデーツ）
summary: The article discusses Kuradashi, an e-commerce website that tackles food loss issues through a social good business model, involving discounts on products close to their best-by dates and donations to social action organizations.
green_innovation: TRUE. This is an example of green innovation as it addresses environmental sustainability goals by reducing food loss and promoting social good within the business model.
business_innovation: TRUE. The article describes a new business process implemented by Kuradashi that differs significantly from conventional food distribution methods, making it a business innovation.
green_product: TRUE. The Kuradashi business model involves offering discounted products close to their best-by dates, reducing food waste and promoting eco-friendly consumer behaviors.
green_process: TRUE. Kuradashi's approach to reducing food loss through its unique business model and operations aligns with the definition of a green process.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 454110 - Electronic Shopping and Mail-Order Houses, 424490 - Other Grocery and Related Products Merchant Wholesalers, 221310 - Water Supply and Irrigation Systems, 722310 - Food Service Contractors
greenwashing: FALSE. The article does not exhibit greenwashing tendencies as it transparently focuses on reducing food loss and promoting social good without misleading environmental claims.
